fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cursed Players will frame anyone they visit, or frame themselves if they do not visit. You do not know who is framed.
- If a Cursed Player votes guilty on any trial during the day, your Grimoire will gain a charge at night.
- There can be a maximum of 2 cursed players, when a third is cursed the oldest is no longer cursed.
- Every night the Grimoire will charge itself passively.
- When you collect 6 charges, you will transform into (3879b) Death.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Empower your Grimoire and transform into Death, Horseman of the Apocalypse.
